video.title: Spicy Lamb Burgers with Raita
video.description: What a fun weeknight meal Chef! Did you know that if you call 1-800-977-1224 when you're hungry, a great chef like Jim will coach you? Shop, menu plan, explore recipes, and learn to cook like a pro by calling ChefsLine - your culinary hotline. We bring out the chef in you! For Chef Jim's recipe, visit ChefsLine's Cooking Blog.
